entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
